question.choice: B: < link src= " url " > link text < / link >

question.ask: To use an image as a link, put the ___________ tag inside the ____________ tag ?
There are two type of lists in html5, what are they ?

question.choice: A: Specifies an image to use as the background of an element
B: Specifies whether the background image should scroll or be fixed
C: Specifies the starting point of the background image
